title: Step 2 â€“ Assess and Prepare the Source Data
summary: Determine whether the original dataset is suitable for synthetic generation. Apply governance, data quality and privacy checks before data access.
checklist: Verify data custodianship, lawful basis and data sharing agreements.
Confirm de-identification or minimisation has been applied where required.
Check data completeness, quality, representativeness and bias.
Assess risks of re-identification in the source dataset.
Document any required approvals or ethics clearance.
